00019 #ifndef _CLIENT_DUMP_HPP_cm121217_
00020 #define _CLIENT_DUMP_HPP_cm121217_
00021 
00022 #include "processor/service.hpp"
00023 #include "network/protocol.hpp"
00024 #include "network/client.hpp"
00025 
00026 namespace {
00027 
00028 // client for streams of I/Q samples
00029 template<typename PROCESSOR>
00030 class client_dump : public client {
00031   // for integer I/Q samples
00032   typedef union {
00033     struct __attribute__((__packed__)) {
00034       boost::int32_t i;
00035       boost::int32_t q;
00036     } iq;
00037     struct __attribute__((__packed__)) {
00038       boost::uint8_t i1,i2,i3,i4;
00039       boost::uint8_t q1,q2,q3,q4;
00040     } samples;
00041   } iq_sample;
00042 
00043 public:
00044   client_dump(boost::asio::io_service&        io_service,
00045             const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00046     : client(io_service, config)
00047     , p_(config) {}
00048 
00049   client_dump(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00050     : client(config)
00051     , p_(config) {}
00052 
00053   virtual ~client_dump() {}
00054 
00055   virtual void process(data_buffer_type::const_iterator begin,
00056                        data_buffer_type::const_iterator end) {
00057     iq_info header_iq;
00058     const header& h(get_header());
00059     // std::cout << "sizeof(iq_info)= " << sizeof(iq_info) << std::endl;
00060     bcopy(begin, &header_iq, sizeof(iq_info));
00061     begin += sizeof(iq_info);
00062     // std::cout << "process: " << h << " " << header_iq << std::endl;
00063     std::vector<std::complex<double> > iqs;
00064     if (header_iq.sample_type() == 'I' && header_iq.bytes_per_sample() ==3) {
00065       const double norm(1./static_cast<double>(1L << 31));
00066       for (data_buffer_type::const_iterator i(begin); i!=end;) {
00067         iq_sample s;
00068         s.samples.i1 = 0; s.samples.i2 = *i++; s.samples.i3 = *i++; s.samples.i4 = *i++;
00069         s.samples.q1 = 0; s.samples.q2 = *i++; s.samples.q3 = *i++; s.samples.q4 = *i++;
00070         const std::complex<double> cs(s.iq.q*norm,
00071                                       s.iq.i*norm);
00072         iqs.push_back(cs);
00073       }
00074       // make up service object
00075       service_net_iq::sptr sp(service_net_iq::make(h, header_iq));
00076 
00077       // call processor
00078       p_.process_iq(sp, iqs.begin(), iqs.end());
00079     } else {
00080       // complain
00081     }
00082   }
00083 protected:
00084 
00085 private:
00086   PROCESSOR p_;
00087 } ;
00088 
00089 #endif // _CLIENT_DUMP_HPP_cm121126_
